      • createMandat

        public static Mandat createMandat(Client client,
                                  Bien bien,
                                  int prix,
                                  java.util.Date dateLimite)
                           throws BienHasTwoMandatsException
        Create a Mandat.
        Parameters:
        idBien - The id of the Bien object
        idClient - The id of the Client object
        prix - The price
        dateLimite - Date of expiration
        Returns:
        A Mandat instance.
        Throws:
        ClientMissingException - If the Client doesn't exist.
        BienMissingException - If the Bien doesn't exist.
        BienHasTwoMandatsException - If there's already a Mandat with the same id.
